articles.title: Heard on the Street: Tesla at $1 Trillion Finally Clears Its Twitter Discount
articles.content: Tesla is a $1 trillion company again.  The EV maker’s stock jumped more than 8% Friday to put the company’s closing market cap over that threshold for the first time since April 2022.  Worries among Tesla investors about the boss’s growing list of distractions and controversial behavior online sparked a selloff on the stock--one that was even harsh enough to get Musk to reconsider his plans and try to get out of the deal.
